Get settled into Gear Springs! Gather materials, craft items, go fishing, and battle it out with punch cards in the ruined facility. Don't get distracted though, you've still got to stop the last Craftsman from destroying the town!
bearcycle® combines fast-paced motorcycle racing with wacky platforming madness. Grind, grapple, and rocket your way through the story mode—or create your own custom levels & share them online!

Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content. Assemble one of the many included puzzles, or add your own images. Customize size and shape of the pieces for any puzzle. Enjoy Classic mode or try out Zen mode for a new type of puzzle experience.

Haiki is the BRUTAL precision platformer where decapitation is just the beginning! Dive head-first into four worlds of colour-switching, laser-dodging, lightning-fast action. Haiki is the platformer where you don't need a body to get ahead.
A block pushing puzzle game with metroidvania style progression, set in a serene forest world.
A fast-paced endless platformer with hundreds of randomized obstacles. Never play the same game twice as you navigate 3 unique levels in this action packed game.
Catapult yourself to incredible speeds in this first-person precision platformer. Use your command over vegetation to build up momentum and decimate the bugs in your way. Just be careful not to fall!

Fight your way through endless waves of holoX's minions! Gear up with all sorts of equipment and items in this action packed beat-em-up to reach the 5 bosses of hololive's "holoX", and put a stop to their plans!
Make your way around your home and surrounding areas, practicing healthy habits and exploring the world in this open ended slice of life puzzle game.

Invent your own path! Phase through walls with your dash and blaze towards the exit. Death Unphased is a short experience fusing precision and puzzle platforming. Speedrun the smartest routes and aim to beat your fastest time in each level.

GOOOAL! is exciting sports arcade. The goal is to defeat opponents in wagers. Use powerful soccer balls with special effects and minigames. Level up your GOOOOOOAL to save up money for a ticket to the big game.

Alpacapaca Dash is an endless runner with lasers and alpacas, a fun, cute and addictive game. Try to get the highest score, the highest amount of coins, unlock all alpacas and play until you can fully restore the world!
A challenging puzzle-platformer where each jump is a puzzle!

Trade illicit cheese in a dystopian cyberpunk city filled with police killbots trying to hunt you down in this ASCII Art text-based early 80s retro trading game. Like a fine blue cheese, this isn't for everyone.

Beginner friendly 2D vertical and horizontal retro-style little shoot 'em up. Colourful stages with sound and vision inspired by the golden age of video gaming. Totally free introduction to the world of Shmups and Bullet Hell Games!

SCORCHING TECHBEAT ACTION! A frantic combo-based score attack shooter. Make combos to earn more time. Master all weapons and defeat a raving mad machine. 100% arcade action. Online ranking. Lots of achievements. A Dual Gunstrike spin off.
a short (about 20-30 min long) but epic animated puzzle game !

Daedaluz is a game about maneuverability and obstacle avoidance where your ship breaks apart as you collide with them. Try to reach the end in consecutive increasingly difficult levels or try infinity mode and see how long you can survive.
Liquidum is an aquatic logic puzzle game, where you strategically fill interconnected aquariums across six challenging sections with unique mechanics.
Flagsplosion is a flag identifying endless quizzer with over 650 current flags from around the world, over 100 Training levels, Practice Mode, and Endless Mode.

Foster a sanctuary for frogs and restore the biodiversity of the wetlands in Kamaeru, a cozy frog collecting game, where you take pictures of frogs, play mini-games and decorate your habitat. Hop right to it!

Embark on a whimsical journey through a vast and vibrant hand-drawn world to reunite with your beloved wiener. But this isn't just any wiener—it's your four-legged friend who's gone on an adventure of their own! This game offers a blend of humor, heart, and the untold thrill of the hunt.
Launch yourself through tough but fair platforming challenges with the power of eggs in this suck and spit momentum based platformer!
Build your own path through randomized levels in this mazing tower defense game! Pick from random towers and upgrades and see how long you can last against the hordes of the undead!
A text-less comic-game hybrid about data, interaction and digital identity playable with only one button.
A fully functional text editor topped with lots of juicy animations and effects that exaggerate your every action.
Telestians is a turn-based strategy war game that takes place in a dark fantasy setting. Build armies, search ruins, conquer castles, and hear the lamentations of their women!
Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles
None
None
Facehand is a synergy-driven roguelike deckbuilder with autobattling mechanics. Craft the perfect deck and chain card abilities to create wild combos!
CucumbeRunner is a action platformer in which you have to help the determined Cucumber through many challenges! Jump, do amazing mid-air stunts, collect gems and uncover carefully hidden secrets!

An exploration game about photographing strange moose, wander through the last moose civilization and take pictures of it's inhabitants to help out moose and humans. As you photograph, you will discover the sinister plot lurking in the moose town.

You are YEETUS! Your weapon? The very floor beneath your feet! YEET your surrounding terrain into destructive projectiles. Be strategic, though. A hasty shot may mean a long fall down to your doom in YEETUS, a casual time survivor game with rogue-lite elements.

Snowyland is a pixel art platformer where the player must eat to survive on an empty, barren island. You should freeze family members to create ice platforms that help you reach your dinner. Choose where this ice platforms are placed, and create solutions that even the developers have not seen yet!

ime: The Secret Life of Dorian Pink
opis: A choices-matter narrative RPG set in an alternate universe of the Picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde. Save your boyfriend Basil from the Devil by making questionable choices, gaining allies, and making doughnuts explode.

Explore a strange dungeon in this nervous action/bullet-hell roguelite shooter. Take the right decisions, find items synergies and build an overpowered and unique character. The Last Game takes inspiration from great games like "The Binding Of Isaac" and "Tiny Rogues".
PixelOver is a software to transform your arts to pixel arts as best as possible, animate in realtime with pixel perfect transformations, bones and key animation system.
None

Monster Bullets is a first-person roguelite where each monster has a specific weakness. Quickly load the correct bullet for each monster and fire them off! Experiment with upgrades on each procedurally generated attempt and try to slay the goblin king!
A game about a Knight, a Dog, Climbing and Rage Quitting.

ime: The Secret Life of Dorian Pink | Prologue
opis: Prologue chapter of Dorian Pink, a choices-matter narrative RPG set in an alternate universe of the Picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde. Save your boyfriend Basil from the Devil by making questionable choices, gaining allies, and making doughnuts explode.
Lost Oliver is a puzzle game heavily inspired by Pokémon. Control little Oliver's mother and use her special abilities to clear the way and rescue her lost baby.
A blend of old school gameplay and new school controls. Experience a classically styled roguelike in a way you never have before!
Blaze a trail through a gauntlet of unique and varied bosses, in this rogue-like boss rush about smoldering want.

Explore a Labyrinth full of magic, monsters, and mystery in this dungeon crawler inspired by retro classics. Wield unique spells to battle enemies, break blocks, and uncover hundreds of secrets hidden within the Labyrinth's walls.

Jump Out is a platformer game that challenges you to master the ability to jump. Inspired by other games that test your climbing skills, this game will push you to the limit as you strive to reach the top.

Gloomgrave is a roguelike dungeon crawler with a retro pixel aesthetic. Upgrade your Gloomcrawler with unique perks and experiment with different builds as you try to survive each depth in search of the ultimate ancient relic.
Mechanic 8230: Episode 1 is an adventure game in the point-and-click genre. Help the mechanic find his robot friend RO-2 and together unveil the secrets of the world destroyed by the Cataclysm.
Explore a tiny world, defeat hundreds of enemies, experiment with the environment, find all secrets and enjoy the Adventure with a friend or in single player mode!

Face off in 'Watermelon Challenge,' the engaging puzzle game where players merge fruits to the rhythm of victory. Duel head-to-head, ascend the leaderboards, navigate a world filled with vibrant strategy, all while your dependable duck ally cheers you on to a peppy soundtrack!
Race in a platform game playable from 1 to 4 players in multiplayer.
A 2D sandbox with a heavy emphasis on action and combat. Features music-synchronized boss fights, village invasions, and more!

Catlike Magic is a top-down auto-shooter where you attempt to dodge groups of gnomes, goblins and other types of short people. Learn magical skills, buy and upgrade items and then complain about getting destroyed by a swarm of lizards after only buying offensive items in this slightly unhinged game.

Thrilling business tycoon sim where you step into the shoes of a drug dealer in 1980s USA. Your main goal is simple: BUY LOW and SELL HIGH. Get ready for a experience where you'll combine strategy, risk-taking, and decision-making to build your criminal empire.

A bullet heaven where you cooperate with Kill-BOI 9000 (your friend and toaster). Forge a beautiful bond and bring destruction - together. Give him saws! Give him drones! Then give all the drones saws! AND THEN SET THE SAWS ON FIRE.

On a special day, spirits emerge, seeking your assistance for a seamless journey to the beyond. In this arcade game with unique gameplay, you need to listen to their requests and gather the essential items to aid their passage into the afterlife. But beware, they can lose their patience!
“A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”
Cave Crawler is a short horror game where you pilot a drone into a cave and discover something horrible.

Dark Sheep is a block-pushing puzzle game with horror elements, and a love letter to the Commodore 64. Classic Sokoban, new twists. Throughout the game, you'll be accompanied by a soundtrack created with genuine 1989 technology.
Hellfire Tactics is a competitive multiplayer autobattler strategy game. Experience intense 8 player matches while drafting from over 90 different units all with their own unique effects on the game.

Gravity Ace is a 2D multi-directional gravity shooter (cave-flyer). Descend into dark caverns, fly and blast your way past enemies, retrieve the reactor core and make your escape, all while fighting the deadly embrace of crushing gravity. Do you have what it takes, pilot?
A sci-fi puzzle platformer using the platform gun

Vanquish thousands of enemies in this class-based action roguelite. Collect experience, level-up, and evolve your weapons to gain overwhelming power. Complete quests to unlock persistent bonuses and weapon modifiers for your next run. Will you conquer or become just another forgotten casualty?
Sensei challenge you! This is a hardcore arcade game in which you will need to complete level in less than 5 seconds!
Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball is a fast-paced sportslike. A cross between Pong and Foosball, Dudelings delivers high-energy multiplayer fun!!

Explore and solve your way through the gloomy halls in which you find yourself stuck. Thinking symmetrically will be key! Isolated and environmental puzzles feature in this (almost) pure puzzle experience.

ime: We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe
opis: ‘We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe’ is a socially engaged, text-based RPG about a journalist looking for his big break by uncovering the plights of refugees travelling from Africa to Europe. It is a story inspired by true events.
SokoChess White is a puzzle game about pushing Chess pieces into their destination and overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

Bunker 21 is a story-driven first-person action game in a post-apocalyptic world. You are the last survivor. Explore the secrets of Bunker 21. Fight against monsters. Find answers in a devastated world.

A Most Extraordinary Gnome is a narrative-driven 2D action game focused on unique boss battles. Protect the forest, keep the animals safe and drive away the incoming darkness in this gorgeous, hand crafted paper cut-out world.

Increase your Chinese vocabulary with this classic and fun memory game. Learn to read either Simplified or Traditional characters, and listen to the pronunciation of each word to help you towards fluency.
A short, spooky pick-em-up platformer.
A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger, fight bosses and jump over pits in this retro experience.

DracoFighter is a solo-developed 2D fighting game with a focus on accessibility and local multiplayer, with movesets that are easy to learn but harder to master. Explore the stories of these hand-animated characters in a futuristic world led by dragons!

Action Packed 2D Arcade Action Platformer featuring hand-drawn graphics. Armed with your fists (or a rolling pin) and a variety of bread-based boosts, fend of the the Alien Plants, and avenge the Bakery they destroyed.
Immerse yourself in a vibrant and tranquil puzzle game, featuring elegant koi fish to enhance your gameplay. Take control of both the white and black pieces to paint the board with amazing colors.

Little Dasher! is a mini-game that offers an average of 30-45 minutes of enjoyable and challenging platform game experience with fantastic music. Please note that the time depends on your reflexes and abilities.
Meteor storm falls on Sweet Country. All country inhabitants disappear. Help little Toby survive, find his Mommy, safe locals and restore his home!

Make choices and take control of Marion's destiny in this award-winning adventure game. Explore the peaceful and relaxing village of Seallea while making new friends and memories. Will you unravel the mysteries behind Marion's appearance in this magical new world?
Bananguy returns for a new epic adventure! Collect "Power Coins" and explore goofy worlds in the ultimate search for the legendary golden banana!

Cow Life Sim RPG is a cozy game where you collect, juice, weave, and burn hundreds of unique items to level up your skills. Explore a lovingly crafted world and meet endearing animal friends. Experience life as it should be - experience life as a cow!
Hack and slash through a corrupted retro computer system in this challenging roguelite with turn-based combat and tons of loot.
This is not "The Great Adventure of the Cute Caterpillar."

Finding Hannah is a relaxing puzzle game about a woman navigating a midlife crisis. Hannah’s got it all: a well-paying job, a fancy coffee machine, and a comfortable life – so why isn’t she happy? Lead her on a journey of self-discovery as you explore beautiful scenes and find hidden objects.
Retro side-scrolling adventure!
Space Ballers it's a game between ships that aims to score the most number of goals in challenging arenas with many obstacles along the way.
ShapeGrid is a casual puzzle game. Find your way through different shapes and colors. Solve 70 hand-crafted puzzles or compete against other players in endless mode!

Avenger Sharks is a retro twin-stick shooter. Featuring sharks. OUT FOR VENGEANCE. Save your fishy friends! Destroy the evils of the deep! Collect power-ups, health potions and upgrades! Invoke the sheer fury of FISH FRENZY or your dinosaur friends to even the odds!

Deadly missions for a deadly group! TH3-M15 Guild is a bullet hell survival game with rogue-lite elements. Undertake assignments, fighting off against armies of robots and creatures alike. Use an arsenal of unique skills, weapons, and items! Do you have what it takes to finish the job, mercenary?
an action-packed arcade shooter that takes you deep into the heart of a computer under siege.You're the system's last line of defense.

ime: DEAD MAN'S HAND: Card Roulette Action
opis: Dead Man’s Hand is a 2-8 player online party game that combines the classic game of Russian Roulette with the unpredictable nature of card games. Featuring private lobbies and public matchmaking, only one can win DEAD MAN'S HAND.

A melee based horde survival game. You are a knight wielding an oversized greatsword. Whirl it around in circles and use your blade's momentum to slash through endless hordes of monsters. But take care! You'll get dizzy from all the spinning!
Play as a Duskweaver in this short "choices matter" story about self-sacrifice.

A dark, psychological romance VN about a British ghost who has haunted you since childhood. When you get close to a new boy at college, he starts to get possessive, and the mind games begin! Voice acted with Live2D-style animated illustrations.

Unforgettable Voyage is a puzzle adventure game full of treasure, traps, and enemies. Play as different members of a dysfunctional pirate crew and harness each of their unique abilities to solve puzzles, avoid enemies, acquire upgrades, defeat the boss, and get the ultimate treasure.

ime: The Heart of the Teddy Bear
opis: Immerse yourself in a relaxed, wintry adventure of emotions and accompany the teddy bear in his search for his child and his purpose in life. After falling out of Santa's sleigh, you'll start in a desolate winter forest and make your way alone to your destination.
SokoSolitaire is a card-pushing puzzle game inspired by Sokoban and Solitaire. You'll find yourself pushing, stacking or flipping cards and more across 60 different handcrafted levels.

A 2D Ghost Hunting Game - Your are a Ghostist investigating a variety of places. Use your ears and smarts to identify the Type of Ghost you are dealing with - but don´t get yourself killed! And once you know what you are dealing with - banish the ghosts!

C&C is a Roguelite Shooter with a Dark theme. Inhabit Cloaker, a caster who grieves for vengeance and whose sole purpose is to resurrect his son as you engulf celestial beings in flames of anguish. Embrace powerups and spells as you pave your path through traps filled caverns and abysses.

Timeline is a turn-based strategy game where you can play through the human history from stone age to modern times. In the game you command wide range of units, make them collect resources and build buildings, towns and cities, explore the map and meet other players controlled by AI.
Breach enemy stronghold in dread Siberian wastelands before insurgents can open gates to Samozbor dimension.
New challenges for the fan of hidden object puzzles! Be our hero! Go to the parallel Universe and find all anomaly to save the Gabenwood from destruction!
Position blocks and solve ciphers to reveal the story of an ancient ruin in this puzzle vignette.

The Adventures of Mr. Hat is an interesting side-scrolling puzzle game with a minimalist design and a wealth of entertaining levels. This game is easy to start and each level has a different way to pass. These levels will blow your mind and develop your imagination!

Play as bunny-hopping wizards with flower guns in a highly-randomized wonderland. Hold a frog in your left hand and a stick gun in your right as you jump around at 25 miles per hour, picking flowers and shooting robots with your friends.

Find over 70 unique monsters to battle, collect and raise. Your monsters will go through a branching path of evolutions to help you explore a dream-like open world. Let your dreams become a reality or look for a way out.

Qwepoi is a speed arcade spaceshooter game using both hands in Q, W, E, I, O, P keys (or even in controller), where you must paint the Infantry ships before they enter the base! Each level inscreases the challenge!

An emotional dark comedy about robots doing therapy. In Robotherapy, you're a robot therapist in a dystopian society that killed all the humans, but is still not happy. Treat patients, meet weird robots and enter their minds. If killing all humans doesn't bring happiness, then what does?
Dance of Cards is a tactical gambling RPG where you try to survive seven days of a deadly cruise by playing poker.
A cute and easy platformer game.

Every move you make counts in this gritty turn-based game! Fight against foes in opposite 3x3 grid boards. Plan ahead of your enemies’ attacks and carefully choose your moves: running out of moves will cost you health, but enemies will always keep coming. How deep can you get into The Dark Cave?
Plan, hack, and fight your way against rogue software in Nightfall Hacker, a turn-based strategy game.
A blocky puzzle platformer adventure.

Gather your party of expendable heroes. Climb a vast tower atop a shiny shield. Who will fight? Who will heal? Who will laze around and take all the treasure? The choices will be yours alone, but only those who work together will be powerful enough to face Medusa at the top of the GORGON SHIELD.

Simona's Requiem is a retro-styled platformer Inspired by old action-adventure games but with a modern touch. Pick up the scythe as Simona and slash your way to the Fisher King who has hidden behind the moon.

Pigeons are plotting to ruin your roof - it's time to fight back in Don't Shit On My #!$@& Roof! Battle through bosses, collect powerful artifacts, and outwit the pigeon horde in this hilarious 2D roguelite pixel art game.
Submarine’s haunted! Hunt and be hunted in this horror dungeon crawler inspired by the decay of the Soviet Union (and immersive RPGs from the 90s).
An action-packed platform-puzzle game! Dodge falling boxes, wrap them up in tape, then stomp them in stacks to rack up combos.
You have an eldritch parasite. It sucks. Find a way to get rid of it while meeting its demands in this strage mix between sidescrolling horror, virtual pet and sarcasm.
Square Journey is a minimalist arcade game that aims to help Square reach the depths of his inner dungeon in search of a greater understanding of himself.

Movement-based horde-escape madness. Weave through hungry geometry and blast away with dual-wield primary and secondary weapons. Deal damage to charge up your special meter and unleash havoc. Multiple different characters to choose from.

ime: Spooky Halloween in the Voxel World (Remake)
opis: Welcome to the Voxel World! Halloween is about to begin and you are excited for your adventure! But remember, in this period, Voxel World is a dangerous place... Hunting season has begun! Don't forget your sword and always follow grandma's advice. The monsters won't go away alone...
The Automata Pinball Wizard game! YOU design the machine and the Automata Pinball Wizard plays it to get a High Score. Earn medals to advance levels and build ever more extensive machines!

A game of strategy and management. The Sumerian Game is one of the earliest computer games. Developed and programmed between 1963 and 1965, it was designed to teach children math, economy and ancient history. The source code was lost but now you can play it again.
Shotgun chicken is a Foddian Precision Platformer Where you use your trusty old shotgun to make it back to the chicken coop but just one wrong move can send you tumbling down to the bottom.
Navigate a platformer using only feeling and memory, each death meaning progress. With your memory illuminating your path, you'll "see" a little more of the level each time you attempt it.

Whackerball is a twin-stick shooter roguelite with Breakout inspired mechanics. Master the unique combat system as you venture through a multitude of diverse areas while collecting powerful and game changing upgrades.

The miners of Rabbit Burrows are falling ill, and it is hurting production. As an eminent scholar of the Animal Kingdom, Charles Quill has been summoned by the Crown to help them solve the outbreak. The miners know and respect the young scholar, but there seem to be other things at play.
Eternower is a mazing-focused Tower Defense. Minimalistic thematically, opportunistic mechanically.

Icemaze Cave: Skate Escape is a 2D puzzle game about path planning with exploration and collection elements. Skate through the icy and labyrinthine depths of Icemaze Cave. Explore the increasingly complex cave rooms and find your way across the icy floors to the exit.

Get off the tree and face the world full of saws, pits and spikes in this hardcore 2D platformer about the nimble white Cat. Make your way through wild plains, thorny deserts and crystal caverns on a challenging yet exciting journey to rescue the lost kitten eggs!
Only 1000 days left until the end of the world. You have to realize the largest space program ever to save as many people as you can. Explore planets, colonize them, help people find a new home.
Swing and parkour through 24 challenging, handcrafted levels, with no checkpoints. Master fluid movement and become the ninja you were meant to be.
Dodge the enemies shot and kill them with different weapons. Move, Dodge and Kill is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler in a neon environment.
SKIP, HOP, JUMP

Red Nose Guy Suika is the latest addition to the Suika series. In this casual game, strategically merge balls to achieve the highest score. Challenge friends on the leaderboard and immerse yourself in an entertaining gaming experience that combines fun and strategy!
A merge puzzle game about spherical cats, with a twist. Play the classic suika experience or try new variations every day!

Assemble your crew, gear them up and fight creatively on this easy to learn but hard to master turn-based tactical roguelite. Capture the most dangerous bounties in the city, cash that juicy bounty and improve your chances of survival on a city filled with crime and jazzy grooves.
A single player arcade-like game where you crush Toilet Cars driven by small suns. See how high of a score you can get!

Blagmoz is a frantic, cutthroat PVP precision platformer with a fluffy fantasy exterior. Outmaneuver your friends with magical movement abilities, best them with your spells, and grow your power by sacrificing them on the altar, in local or online multiplayer. Now with Steam Workshop support!

First and only chess career simulator! Play chess with help from your AI character, solve chess puzzles, build an unrivaled openings repertoire, and win tournaments worldwide. Can you become World Chess Champion?
One egg stands alone vs an army of zombie chickens! Get to the chopper or you're clucked. A free-range frenzy from the eggheads behind Shell Shockers, Slayaway Camp and Plants vs Zombies.

BitBattle is a 2D multiplayer action shooter. Zero Aim, 100% Bullet Hell! Collect Weapons and Items and fight against friends or other players. You also can race in our FunRun Mode. But be carefull, its not easy!

Immerse yourself in SurvivalScape, a fast-paced auto-shooter bullet hell! Select your hero from a diverse roster, each boasting unique abilities and play-styles. Battle relentless waves of enemies, gather crystals to level up, and face off against formidable bosses. Can you survive?

Slay endless hordes of demons to protect the Cosmic Library! Steal their abilities, find powerful equipment, and unlock the secrets of each spellbook to become unstoppable! Will you be able to destroy the demonic legion?

Youkai have overrun Gensokyo! There's no resolving this incident, just try to survive! Touhou: Gensokyo Survivors is the latest take on the survivor genre, this time with the unique twist of a grid-based inventory system. Hoard as many items as possible if you want to survive!
Team up with your "other self", Honno-chan, as you parry, pummel and pulse your way out of your darkest nightmare in this one-of-a-kind "parry heaven" action game!
Endhall is a byte-sized roguelike. Become an artificial intelligence and combine tactical actions to defeat your enemies and reach the end of the hallway.
Protect a psychedelic world from bizarre beasts and punishing bosses in this poetic mystery filled with secrets, puzzles and music.
Mindsight is a minimalistic evolution of a match-3 game. The goal of the game is to find all sets of three adjacent symbols whose characteristics either match or differ.

space vanguard is a plane shooting game with science fiction theme, which tells the story of an insignificant landing battle against stars. The player will act as a paratrooper and take part in this attack on the planet controlled by Winchester's military industry.
Swing Lord is a grappling hook game with a heavy emphasis on high stakes climbing. Use your tentacles to reach the highest peaks this unique and dangerous world has to offer.
Tether is an abstract arcade platformer about elastic connections and arcing flights. Swing and fly through 4 different game modes, in a peaceful, endless world.

„Spirit of Shotgun: Platforming Escapade, Never in Silence“ is a 2D platformer adventure with a twist! With no other way to move around, your quest is to blast yourself upwards with the kickback of a shotgun, and find your way to the surface of the world!
In Hexes, you move gems on a diamond shaped game board. Matching three or more gems of the same colour will remove them from board. Keep finding matches to prevent your board from filling up.

Duplicado is a soothing yet challenging puzzle game with unique avocado-themed mechanics. Journey across a serene avocado orchard, planting trees as you slide and solve your way through a nearly endless number of satisfying puzzles.

ime: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of The Spankster
opis: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster is an interactive novel style choose your own adventure game in which players take the role of Conner, a normal high school kid that gains a very unique super power: the ability to pull limitless pencils out of his pockets.
An eerie anti-rhythm hiden-object roguelike. Avoid a procedurally generated song. Look for pearls in a surreal wonderland. Experience hyperacusis from the comfort of your seat.

ime: Sneak In: a sphere matcher game
opis: Sneak In is a marble shoot game with the theme of Amazonian Jungle. It is easy to play, but truly addictive. Your goal is to clear all the marbles before they reach the end of the path, and meanwhile, achieve Marbles and Combos as many as possible to get the highest score.

January, 1915. The Race to the Sea is over. The Great War has just begun. You are the commander of a single division in the meat grinder that is the Western Front. Lead your men over the top as you attempt to break the stalemate that is to claim the lives of millions over the course of years.
Flutter around to dodge falling eggs from chickens above, and collect corn and power ups to drop eggs on the unlucky fowl below!

Delve into grid-based tactical combat in this roguelike deckbuilder. Coordinate your heroes, modify your cards with unique runes, construct powerful item builds, and sidestep card-corrupting terrain to survive a gauntlet of befouled enemies.

A slice-of-life sim about the joy of gardening, designed to be picked up and played in short and sweet bites. Whether you’re fishing, growing, trading, or making new vegetable friends, a wonderful and wistful adventure awaits when wandering The Garden Path.
A small puzzle game about getting out of big trouble! Trapped in a prison, a Wizard uses telekinesis to push and pull their way out and escape together with newfound friends!

Deep Sixed is a roguelike space sim that will force you to use strategy, ingenuity and duct tape to keep your ship (and your skull) in one piece as you risk exploring a mysterious nebula protected by dangerous alien creatures.
A card battler where you play cards by solving a puzzle with those cards! Play on the same board (literally) as your enemies.
Dairy Dave is unlike any endless runner you have come across yet!
Play as Sisyphus in the ancient Greek underworld, clearing obstacles and pushing your special rock towards the target in over 70 levels of this short Sokoban-like puzzle game with a 1-bit art style.
Kitty is lost! Find her best friends and favorite toys to coax her out of her hiding place. Search for all the hidden items at your own pace while enjoying the relaxing lo-fi tunes.
None

This light-hearted summer comedy game invites you to talk to people and make it to the end as fast as you can. Step into the whimsical world of Alice and Nick, navigating the quirky challenges of modern life with special charm.

A dungeon crawl in glorious 160x144 resolution. Fight unforgiving battles in tight corridors. Use powerful, limited magic to overcome the odds. Refine your approach and defeat the wizards, or succumb to their will.
Play as a gardener in Wise Garden, a puzzle game inspired by feudal Japan. Play with zen garden's elements and find your own solution to please your clients. Establish yourself as the best gardener.
This game will consist of games made in UngAalborg's GameLab.

Woodland Empire is an anti-citybuilder:, a natural take on the typical city building game. Instead of building roads and power lines, you'll control the wind, rain and sunlight to help your forest grow. Employ the help of woodland creatures to manage, upgrade and grow your empire.

ime: Rope Cow - Rope it to The Cow
opis: Rope swing like never before.
An asymmetric VR game where you will have to cooperate in order to solve puzzles.
Demon Cycle is a casual strategy game, where luck favors the prepared. You have limited turns to make enough coins to pass the floor. Your choices will determine the outcome.

Experience an exciting journey in a surreal world, fight for your name, your social status and to survive. Leave the arena as a winner, with money, a lot of loot and hopefully a good speedrun time. Retry to improve, test different weapons, loadouts and skillsets.
A combination of a board game and platformer. Roll the dice and play your cards to complete all the levels. Don't forget to pet the animals along the way!

You have managed to put together a school on top of this wastelands, now it's your turn to defend your students by strategically rearranging their desks and wetting the evil fish that want to prevent them from having a nice education &lt:,3
Fun, casual platformer game with beautiful 1 bit pixel art, nice sharp controls and challenging levels.

Survive Hell as a snowman until you can freeze it over! in this casual action roguelike, you can "snowball" your way through the demons of Hell by collecting power ups and avoiding lava. but you might just have a snowman's chance...
A lesson in momentum and it's consequences. BOINKGAME is a precision platformer where walls make you rage.
A fast paced platformer about a hot dog in a hurry
Desert Kingdoms is a minimal real time strategy game. Protect your king and conquer the desert.
A fruit merging game with a spicy twist!

Have you ever wanted an idle game without all the pesky obstructions like gameplay and graphics? Introducing Idle Game Simulator! Is it a game? No, it is a very serious and deep simulator. This is idle in its purest form, watch number go up without having to do anything at all!

A horror anthology in the Dread X Collection series. Featuring 12 new games from up-and-comers along with veterans, all wrapped up in an old, run down party venue that may be hiding more than it's letting on...
You have no weapons. You have no means of defending yourself. Some will chase you, some will outsmart you. If you are in danger, run and hide.

Inhabit Krog, a mysterious blue creature in a red loincloth, as he traverses a labyrinth of ladders, levers, traps, and monsters. Explore the nooks and crannies of a bizarre and evocative world as you hack and slash your way to victory, leaving a graveyard of grotesque bosses in your wake.

Aetheris is a tactical RPG with challenging turn-based battles set in an immersive and vibrant environment. Make the right choices and find the best strategy to survive in the unforgiving Wilderness. Journey alone or as a party of four—the adventure awaits!

A punishing, one-button platformer about escaping prison. Test your skills and intellect as you ascend a tower of hand-crafted challenges. Jump, fly, slide up walls, float in bubbles and perform somersaults:, all with the press of a single button. Reach the paramount. Reach.

Drakkon World Builder is a comprehensive tool for generating, creating and roleplaying with your favorite table top role-playing game systems. It comes with a world generator, dungeon mapper, solo-play oracle and a variety of other helpful tools to let you role-play solo or with friends!

Diefrosty is an unsurvival puzzle game, where your one and only goal is to kill your ice-cuby character no matter how. Intereract with many obstacles, use really dumb ways to die while melting your brain to beat each level.

Lucky Hero is a Roguelike symbol-building game. Your weapons and equipment have transformed into symbols, and by spinning the Wheel of Fortune, you will face various powerful enemies. This game offers a vast array of symbols and character skills for players to explore and combine.
TETRAGUN is quadrant-based shooter where you're surrounded on all sides. You'll gain powerful upgrades as you progress, but so will your enemies.

Holy cow, it’s all about the moooney! Run, jump and slide in this udderly moo-velous adventure to reclaim your fortunes from those sneaky Pig Pockets. Tough as nails and no continues! Are you up for the challenge?

Malice & Greed is a Roguelike Turn-based RPG where you force enemies & bosses to join you after each fight, sell them to the Shady Smuggler, and butcher them to steal their skills. Customize & upgrade a new team every run to build the ultimate combo as you battle to reach Nirvana!
A incremental game about downloading files, uploading, and upgrading your setup. This is the official PC version of Upload Simulator.
A bullet hell fishing game, this / Bop fish with your hook, do not miss / With loot from the blue / a way is paved to / a fishing apotheosis.
Hashi: Light is a puzzle game for Windows and Mac, which contains over 1000 challengeable puzzles.
Instead of a vacation, go on a short, light adventure through virtual reality, religion, and of course, basketball.

Smash, bash, and plow your way through traffic in this 2D arcade throwback. Collect power-ups to survive long enough to unlock new cars with special abilities. Upgrade your vehicles to increase your survivability in this increasingly difficult highscore chaser.
Tetris? Not! Mutant Tetris!

Gem World is a short roguelike/puzzle hybrid. Explore 50 levels in 5 unique worlds. Dodge boulders, collect gems, fight (or avoid) monsters. Unlock and upgrade more than 10 diverse skills. Exploit obstacles like mines, icicles, cactii, and more. Turn-based and easy to play.

Raimodula is a dynamic arcade platformer, featuring customizable characters and randomized progression. Unlock habilities, fight modular enemies and navigate surreal environments with intense and polished gameplay!
None
Chasmal is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Descend into a ruined machine using powerful items to overcome foes and reach the bottom of the depths.

Push and pop your way through Stack Machines - an open-ended puzzle programming game. Use a variety of modules to read, transform and output different input sequences. Optimize your solutions for size, module count, speed and cost-effectiveness.

Frantic 4-player laser ricocheting top-down shooter. Keep it casual and enjoy the chaos, or master the surprisingly deep mechanics to obliterate your enemies. Duke it out locally in free-for-all or 2v2.

Fight against the flock of tired workers on a boring Monday morning with a cup of coffee and keep the economy flowing. Wake up, sell, lose, improve, repeat! A clicker tower defence game with rogue-lite meta progression.

we don't have to do this. why don't we just leave? asks you your bestfriend while you try to escape your hometown. and you start hating them. and you start hating yourself. can you pull through or will you choose to go home again? both decisions feel wrong but this time it's you who has to choose.

The girl woke up in a dark wasteland and couldn't think of anything. It was a terrible world, full of dangers and full of wandering dark shadows. Be careful not to get caught by them. "Welcome to the ██courtyard——""

PUZZLETIME: Lovely Girls is a classic jigsaw puzzle game in which you need to assemble an image-scene with one of the beautiful girls from many details. The game allows you to relax for an exciting gameplay and get to know the life of 5 beauties during 20 puzzle-scenes.
Master outdated technology and navigate the phone tree from hell to get your internet back on. At all costs.

Players take on the role of a spacefaring merchant in a galaxy filled with diverse planets, each with its own economy, resources, and challenges. Amass wealth and reputation by trading goods, negotiating with factions, and navigating the intricacies of interstellar commerce.

A turn-based RPG that is action-oriented but rewards a thoughtful approach. Explore a fantastic land populated by different animal tribes. Follow the main story or hunt for treasures in ancient ruins and mysterious dungeons. Develop your character and gain powerful equipment.

Wreak vengeance and retake lost mines from goblins, orcs, skeletons, and demons in this small-scale tactical roguelite RPG. Build the perfect expedition team and turn the underworld red with each challenging, fast-paced run.

Moonshot is a stealth puzzle platformer that puts you in the role of a spy of a fictional country in the 'moon race' era. In competition with the USA and the Soviet Union, you will have to use espionage and sabotage to make sure that your nation will be the first on the moon.
Try games of various genres and styles, from sports, to games with a deep plot. Discover new game universes and explore them alone, online or in co-op mode on one screen.
Teamkill is a fast and chaotic team-based multiplayer shooter where the teams are always changing and every shot counts.

Shoot lasers in space because a fish told you to. Ernesto's Asteroid Arcade is a twin-stick side-scrolling space shoot-em-up which tells the story of a man side-scrolling in space and shooting-em-up with twin-sticks. This game has at least 2 characters in it.
Play as Fallenshadow by taking on the form of 12 girls and access 70 perks to help you fight off your husbands.
You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. A short psychological horror game.

Aquarius is a 90's style arcade game where you play as a cave diver in search for treasure, guarded by the ocean's fiercest predators and its cuddliest minnows. Navigate through the caves, collect the treasure, and survive!

Sky Escort is a rogue-like card game featuring TD and management. Players roleplay an airborne mercenary,escorting clients' cargo to earn rewards. Buildcard decks, recruit crew members, and customize arms to enrich gameplay. Multiple factions can be chose from, each with unique combat style.

Multiplayer. Versus. Co-op. Achievements. Stage-making. Swords. These are all words. And by random chance they also happen to describe all the major features of Sword Game, a free Action-Party game where up to 4 players can have a grand old time slashing and stabbing each other or CPUs.

One eleven is a dark detective story about twelve lonely people who, by chance, find themselves in the same house with a mad maniac. Who will be the victim and who will be the killer? Be attentive and courageous, and solve the riddles of One Eleven.

To escape the city of Starkham and start your new life, your friend Preston sets up a meeting with the local loanshark, Sweaty Mike. After foolishly borrowing $2,000, you embark on a timed mission to sell as many illicit substances as possible. Based on John E. Dell's 1984 classic game Drugwars.

Traverse as a curious creature driven by the desire to unveil the mysteries of the realm. Consider it a lost 8-bit era game, each level with its own distinct 4 colour palette. Delve deeper and you notice the magic per-pixel lighting & immersive 2D audio which make this a unique experience.

Constellations is a puzzle game about finding patterns in the stars. Increase mindfulness, concentration and focus through an endless number of increasingly complex mechanics. Evade yourself from everyday life as you build constellations in the sky.

A unique puzzle game with an interesting story. Witness the story of Josh Lattey while solving mind boggling puzzles using mirrors and reflections. Mirrorama offers an exceptional experience for puzzle game lovers.

Experience the beginnings of Blacken Slash – a tactical roguelite RPG where the items you choose define your character. Create powerful builds from an abundance of loot as you try to save a corrupted retro computer system in bite-sized tactical puzzles.
None
Endless runner with roguelite elements. throw pineapples to defeat enemies while running away from a polar bear riding a ninja. Chose items to throw better, jump higher and defend yourself.
The Entity Code is a sci-fi themed 2D puzzle game with simple but challenging mechanics.
Bavovna included! - a satirical, casual indie game - manifesto in the Shoot 'em up genre with pixel graphics about russian troops in Ukraine. Memes and Easter eggs are included in the price!
Grave Robber is a simple, tiny, fun and challenging arcade game where you'll face hordes of undead enemies and try to get the highscore.

Sons of Saturn is a narrative focused adventure game set in a collapsing underground city, brought to life using photos of real life abandoned locations as assets. Experience both wonder and horror as you explore the city of Minerva, where the dead dream and memories cling to life.

Flashman, Flashman Gold he is called because he is a super fast gold smith.Now his gold has been stolen by gold stealing monsters thieves and now there is only one thing to do, get the gold back!!! 30 beautiful levels, especially for people who have experienced the 80'

Revitalize a world of machines across multiple islands in this captivating puzzler. Unlock new mechanics in 40 levels, blending strategy and color theory. Get ready for an electrifying color adventure!

opis: A collection of 8 experimental games from different indie game developers. Grow tea on the Moon! Fish on Saturn! Find love on Mars! And 5 other things!
Kinetic Anatomy 3D is a sports anatomy learning software offers a wealth of 3D animation demonstrations of human muscle and skeletal movements.
Hunt a plethora of monsters using unique items in a dynamic turn-based grid puzzler! Complete the bite-sized levels in as few turns as possible and help V-Hunter defeat the evil vampire Alric!

Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real time combat indie game. This version features only one playable character and serves as the prologue for the game.
All I want you to do is catch fish and search for others who seem hungry. You are only a bird.

Take a bite of GETTING CHAMBERED in the Wild West: improvise to survive. Feed and take care of your horses. Open World with warring factions. Skills and upgrades: catch bullets, eat hats, summon bears. Revolver Monsters!

Solve puzzles while uncover two points of view of a story. The serial killer known as Mantis commits crimes freely while Sergei, his adopted brother, is in charge of preventing his mysterious objective from being completed.

They're in the vents! Become Chris, cleaner of labs — a janitor armed with the mysterious Transmogrify gun. Escape the depths of Future Perfect Labs by turning a horde of escaped monsters into tools and objects that help you puzzle-solve and platform your way to freedom!
Hotel on the Grate is a short(15-20 min), narrative adventure game. Assume the role of an on call therapist and travel across the city on the grate to meet your patients.

Alchemia is a turn-based strategy roguelike with a hint of puzzle. You'll collect alchemical reagents, building your own personalized combat satchel, and combine them into magical recipes, unique to each run, to battle against outlandish foes.
The End of You is a short, emotional narrative game about love lost, the ghosts of the past, and the painful crawl towards closure.
Operator is a minimalist elevator management game. Your job is to get passengers to their destination before they stress out. Can you keep up with the demand?
Brawl Tactics: Origins fuses deck-building roguelikes and the tactics RPG genre like never before - lead your units, collect valuable trinkets and cast powerful spells to ensure victory!

Megaloot: Prelude is an addictive Inventory Management Roguelike RPG, where meticulous loot management paves the way for creating diverse and powerful builds. Combine deck cards and loot strategically to craft dominating builds and become the ultimate power hunter.
Pick and choose between tons of weapons, spells and equipment to create a build capable of surviving a never-ending horde of monsters. Find a build, break the game and see how far you can take it.

Striving for Light: Survival brings the exploration of infinite expanding skill trees to the arena survival roguelite genre. Unlock new characters, weapons, skills and maps, slay hordes of monsters and take on massive boss fights.

Jump on your friends and rack up points! Easy pick-up-&-play local multiplayer, even kids can play it! 8 players on the same screen, multiple levels, and a level editor, with full gamepad support! A spiritual successor to the DOS PC game "Jump 'n Bump" by Brainchild Designs.

GoBlaster is a retro bullet-hell game where you can always beat your personal best. Blast through enemies while dodging their overwhelming attacks in a fast-paced and addictive setting. Make your way to the final boss, and just try to survive!
A challenging puzzle platformer where you can only move in one direction.
Lab Remnants is a monochromatic roguelike full of secrets and challenges. Play as an artificially made creature and make your way through your own creators to escape from their crazy experiments.

Flow to the beat of your own music in this punishingly difficult mouse-precision arcade game. Enjoy endless challenge and replayability with over 30 different levels of various difficulties. Includes Steam achievements and leaderboards.

Somnipathy is a story focused point-and-click horror adventure. Help Aggy overcome nightmares, earn upgrades during the day, and survive another night in dungeons themed after sleep disorders like Sleep Paralysis, Restless Leg syndrome, and more.
Placement is a minimalist logic puzzle game based on chess.

Roma Invicta combines action packed real-time battles with turn-based strategy on a big campaign map. Supply your legions and conquer ancient Gaul turn by turn. Fight by yourself or hand over your soldiers to the AI ​​and enjoy the spectacle.

Welcome to Gundy, a short and sweet 2D platformer made by d4rkd0s. Your mission as Gundy is to find a weapon, eliminate the enemy snakes along your path. Try to find access to the boss room. Once you enter the room prepare for a difficult fight, only those with true skill will win!

Destroy hordes of undead skeletons in this top-down roguelite arena shooter. In Hunchback's Dungeon, you play as a deformed, magic-wielding human who can control up to 4 different spells. Unlock new characters, collect unique items, equip powerful spells, and survive until the end.

Lumencraft is a unique combination of a top-down, rogue-like shooter and base building with tower defense elements. Dig and light up dark halls of a fully destructible environment on procedurally generated maps and campaign levels to find precious Lumen - humanity's only chance for survival.
Tricells is a tranquil logic puzzle game and is the first game in the Geocells series.

Slimesphere is an isometric turn-based tactics game, where the goal is to kill the enemy slimes within 3 rounds. Its deterministic mechanics make the levels feel like puzzles, and you have to figure out the best strategy to win!
DreamCell : Lost in Nightmares is a randomly generated action with rogue-like elements. Conquer your nightmares and find a way out of your dark dreams in single player or co-op mode!
Explore the ice-encrusted ocean of Jupiter's moon Europa.

A roguelike twin-stick shooter, where you defend the same thing that tries to hurt you. Venture into the side of darkness to defeat enemies before they reach the Yin-Yang. Switch to the side of light to gather energy and upgrades, before the time runs out and the next wave of monsters spawn.

Sluggerpunk is a gripping 2D survivors roguelike adventure. As you navigate through a myriad of challenges, hone your skills and strategies to clash with formidable foes lurking in the underground. Build a versatile arsenal of abilities and gear to enhance your chances to survive, but will you?
Classic rail shooter action. Find secrets and tactics to clear levels effectively across three difficulty settings. Unlock mini games as you progress.
You just visited the earth and got a famous 'Human Souvenir'. Would you be able to keep your human alive enough time to see them through their whole life cycle?

In this arcade-style game, chasing higher scores becomes an addictively fast-paced quest for precision. Count to Ten challenges you to tap numbered shapes in sequence, ramping up the challenge with every success. Pure, quickfire fun!
This is a cute game for finding foodie kittens! A few maps and a chance to find the furry creatures that are cleverly hiding!"

ime: 星礼研究所 | Sighchology Research Lab
opis: In this game, you play as a student in the Sighchology Research Lab. In this dark place, you do research every night and day without sleep, because you have been given a great mission: to publish a piece of paper...
The horror began when you wrote your first note.
A cute and colorful time management game yet intense! Discover the mental load as you play this otter couple taking care of their house and family in their daily life.
ASCEND the peak in search of the Joyspring. Explore every cavern and cave, crevasse and chasm. Hear the wind sing. Keep dashing and find the spring. And when you return, return smiling.

回家 - Homeward a relaxing puzzle game, Follow a team of Leopard Cat, black bears and monkeys, native to Taiwan, as they lead you on an adventure from the city to the mountains, exploring Taiwan together and bringing back scenes you may have seen before in your memory.

Neon Fighter is a tiny arcade game packed with lasers and explosions, in which every few seconds you are forced to switch weapons automatically, making you have to adapt quickly to the new situation and re-evaluate your perspective.

Too Many Sheep might be the ultimate sheep herding game. Work together with up to 4 players navigating challenging courses or compete with each other to herd your sheep the fastest. Too Many Sheep offers fun for players of all levels. Will you collaborate or compete? Play Too Many Sheep to find out!

Interstellar Plunderer is an indie arcade-style 3D roguelike space shooter game. Take control of a pirate spaceship as you fly through wormholes, do battles with hordes of oncoming enemies, fight fearsome bosses, and gain plunder to spend on new ships and upgrades. How far can you go?
Bring broken pieces together, to reveal shapes of everyday objects. Travel with a Daisy and a Maggot along side several scenarios and discover to where they are headed to.
Armechgeddon is a chaotic action rogue-lite with a minimalist control scheme. Pick the right mech and pilot for the job, and lay waste to hundreds of enemies with your custom arsenal.

A game of diplomacy and war in the atomic age. Safeguard your closest allies and change unfavorable regimes without giving away your long-term ambitions. Every action risks an enemy reprisal, and if nobody backs down from a standoff, we all lose.

Haulin' Oats is a board game about truck driving, the US highways, and oatmeal. Four players compete to deliver their cargo then return to the warehouse while avoiding various dangers along the way. Take part in sabotage, races, curses, and more to get the upper-hand.

Slay goblins with style by using wits and magic in this unique physics-based puzzle game! Craft solutions to each level by combining several magical behaviors together. Levels are open-ended and reward creative and original solutions.

A casual Incremental idler/clicker mix with a variety of weapons and traps to achieve your goals. No prestige, and ever increasing progress:, watch the numbers get ever larger to the point where the fabric of reality breaks down.

Klaystar is a 2D precision platformer, where the player controls Klay, a talented boy with the ability to turn into a bouncy ball, along with his friend Malo. Experience the mysteriously wonderful world of the Pillar, as you follow two boys seeking to join the honorable Vanguard.

Faraway Proximity is a third-person puzzle game about recovering lost books. You have been contacted to recover a set of misplaced books. Find them by solving different types of challenges and uncover more puzzles by reading their stories.

Ovivim é um bichinho virtual para streamers que vive em lives da Twitch por livre e espontânea vontade. Essas criaturinhas possuem muitas formas diferentes, e como elas crescem depende de como você cuida delas.

Movement-based horde-escape madness. Weave through hungry geometry and blast away with dual-wield primary and secondary weapons. Deal damage to charge up your special meter and unleash havoc. Multiple different characters to choose from.
SokoChess Black is a puzzle game about pushing and capturing Chess pieces while overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.
A retro arcade throwback where you hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory! YOU MUST NOT BE SEEN! Do you have the skills to top score?

ime: I made this Game in 3 Days

Use Morse Code to communicate with your crewmate and ward off a stalking monster in this short point-and-click horror game.

Dodo is a tricky puzzle game where you have to enter the correct word to get to the next level. The letters you enter will change the grid on the screen - and you must get that grid to match the symbols!
Empty Skull is a pixelated indie puzzle game with RPG elements that revolves around a skeleton trying to recollect its life.

Katana's Path is a fast-paced arena arcade slasher, where you can control your samurai and your katana in a unique game mechanic. Slash through many enemies at a rainy cyberpunk city or colorful forests using the best gear you can get!

In this mechanically challenging 2D hack and slash game, survive through waves of enemies in an ever increasing difficulty, having the satisfaction of feeling your improvement as you learn the enemies and adopt new strategies to deal with them.
Evil aliens invaded our peaceful pixel country. They destroyed all living thing around. You must stop them. Make the deadly jump into the darkness, defeat the Crushers and save our world!
A cute turn-based tactics game about growing stronger, making friends and conquering foes! Become a cat, expand your territory and reign supreme over your enemies through dynamic tactical combat!

Ready your typing skills and defeat the quirky enemies of the Tower of Verbum. Collect coins, relics, and experience to buy items, assign stats and unlock permanent upgrades. How far will your typing skills take you?
Fast-paced top-down physicsy space dogfighting action
Birb Café is a coffee-making visual novel about a cute bird helping adventurers on their quests. Your choices matter!
Stalwart knight, align yourself for battle! Synchronize the energetic patterns within XANARTHRAXIA's ancient glyphs and cleanse the land of evil in this bite-sized, casually competitive, RPG clicker.

ime: Dust and Salt: The Battle for Murk
opis: The Battle for Murk is an interactive narrative set in a gritty medieval world. Play as Corporal Mandrake from the City Watch in a fantasy adventure game. Uncover the truth behind a treacherous conspiracy in a race against time to save your hometown from falling into the hands of a cruel barbaric leader.

The adventure begins by navigating your way through the Sanctuary of the Orbs. A mysterious quest, the elemental orbs lying in wait for the ranger to claim and an ancient map to be remade. The Sanctuary of the Orbs is no ordinary building as the corridors twist and turn like a maze.

Endless Waves Survival is an adrenaline-fueled endless survival game. Fight a continuous onslaught of enemies and claim upgrades and new abilities as you level up. How long will you survive the next run?
Fleeting kinematic novel about tea party. How does it ends with appearance of the cursed castle? Hidden gem from russian visual novels is here to enrich your cultural statement.

Dashpong is a high energy arcade local multiplayer game where you dash all around the maps at full speed. Create paddles to defend your goal and shoot the ball at your opponent to score. Enjoy the game up to 4 players in local multiplayer.
PSYCHEDELIC SHOOTER!
An addictive Clicker-Looter game where you defeat Thousands of monsters to loot equipment and get stronger, that can be as Relaxing or Frenetic as you like!

Greetings your Excellency. Time to rebuild, reform and prepare for new challenges in the People's Republic of Basenji. In this thrilling political strategy, you will appoint ministers and lead the country to success. Be careful — you may find yourself replaced in the next election.

Three AI Lifeforms used to live here, thinking and dreaming about their existence. Three AI Lifeforms went on into a higher reality and left everything behind. Three AI Lifeforms stories are left to unfold… Can you understand and unravel their past? Their AI Stories? Made by Emir Akyazi

In this game you will play as an archaeologist who is driven by a desire to find an ancient artifact. The hero will travel to Greece to solve riddles and avoid hazardous traps. But he is not the only one who wishes to obtain the treasure. Two other adventurers also arrive at the forgotten island.
In ROTA gravity bends beneath your feet! Move blocks and twist gravity to solve puzzles. Collect all 50 gems and explore 8 vibrant worlds!

Mayhem Survivors is an action rogue-like game, where you feed cute animals with various different foods in order to Survive. It is inspired by Survivors-like games and features 3 different game modes.

Micro macro farm is a small relaxing and cozy game about farming. Plant seeds, harvest them and create products. Make money and gain experience to unlock more seeds, buy machines and expand your garden.

Fight against numerous mutated creatures across this desolate land. Unlock characters, items, and learn of the world’s history. Dive into this action packed sidescrolling, rogue-lite experience. Fight, die, try again.

- Search for clues to progress the story. - Make choices to help your partner. - Collect bits and pieces to reveal secrets and lore bits. - Use your visions to see what he is feeling at the moment. - Don't drown in your own regrets.
Explore the liminal corridors of a company that only... rotates documents? This short artistic Indie title combines 2D exploration with paper physics to create a truly unique experience.
A word game RPG roguelike where you collect resources, solve dangerous situations and prepare for a showdown with each Master Villain to discover the meaning behind the Word of Yendor!
Play as a Rattus, a psychic rat capable of summoning meteors and altering the fabric of time. He decides to fight some birds. Can you help him survive?

ime: The Hero with a Thousand Arms / 千手英雄
opis: This game challenge you to play many mini games in one screen at the same time.

ime: Stick Knight Takes Over the Universe
opis: It's conquest time in Sticktopia! So, go on a conquest with 30 unique weapons. Along the way you'll fight in worlds everywhere from an aquarium to a candy-filled world to an asteroid belt! Conquer each area with a different weapon and 30 seconds on the clock for a fast-paced arcade experience!

You're a fox in this cute, funny, nature-themed brick-breaker game with a twist! Explore, discover and rescue its animal friends in 21 colorful, non-linear levels with an auto-map. Bounce or rotate your ball. Destroy or avoid cute obstacles. Levels are uniquely generated and highly replayable. Awoo!
TrackMaster is an all-terrain, all-vehicles, physics based sandbox and racing game: play whatever way you want, in any kind of track and event, with any vehicle!

opis: The Battle for Castle Itter is a solitaire card driven tabletop boardgame.
Porridge Nikolay and his friends are preparing for final Computer Science exam. What could go wrong?
Take on the role of a thief with an unusual fate in a totalitarian country.

Do you also sometimes want to do something crazy? Get carried away and start a challenging, epic and unique challenge? Discover the limits of your own nervous endurance? If so, this game is perfect for you.
An action bullet hell. Dodge enemies attacks and collect upgrades to make it to the end of each level.
Race across low gravity sci-fi sandbox circuits and explore levels for shortcuts! Features unique ramping mechanics - ramp across entire levels! Wholesome high speed fun for everyone :)

STACK STONES, a physics based multiplayer stacking and party game with multiple game modes. Enjoy playing alone to beat your former best mark or compete against others in funny multiplayer matches ... but watch out for your opponents, they want to smash your stack!

A gritty, short-form narrative experience about a young black man who lives with his sickly older sister. Struggling to support the both of them, he comes home from work one day to find something strange at his front door...
A fast paced 2D platformer, Plunder Islands has you running, jumping and climbing for treasure. Are you ready for the challenges the islands reveal?
A humourous little adventure where you have the power to shapeshift other objects and wear a great big stack of hats
Fight back against the evil Galactic Federation! It'll be good for humanity and probably OK for you.
Punishing pixel-art platformer about puppetry and potions!
Fight against the clock as you gather as many chickens you can in this Bullet Hell and bring them home back home.
Crop and Claw is a classic-style JRPG all about dragons. Delve into swamps, temples, and ruins and fend off flora, fauna, and unsavory dragonfolk.

A fantastic but difficult Bullet Hell. Shoot enemies all around. Experience the unique 'Bullet Absorb' system by stop firing, change threaten to your energy. Get ability upgrade through 8 levels with well-designed atmosphere.
Otaku culture inspired top-down danmaku shooter.
A fast-paced, score-attack movement shooter. Mow down an endless horde of robots, flying through hand-crafted arenas at breakneck speeds.

Make your way through a grueling work week in this chaotic survival horror game. Keep your monstrous boss happy, fend off the competition and keep the machinery going whilst producing suspicious dolls. And race a 7-ton steam lorry to deliver the packages in a rush.
This is a simple and complex puzzle game about light. You need to use Optical components to direct lights and lit up the rings.

Fracture Hell is a replayable arcade shooter featuring dynamic destruction and deck building. Choose a class, equip your favorite guns and build a deck of upgrade cards to beat your current high score and unlock new gear.

An indie puzzle game based on satisfying explosions and an exciting story.Use your skills to solve levels with varying TNT's and progress through the fun and exciting story of Amber, you and the Corporation™!

An Accessibility First Real Time Strategy Game, built from the ground up to work with only one hand and limited sight. Entirely single player all movement and control is preformed via keyboard, the camera system was designed around the physical layout of the number pad on keyboards.

An original roguelite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos.

Polychromia is a fresh take on logic puzzles where one tries to blend colors together on a grid and make flowers bloom. 100+ simple yet challenging puzzles, along with calm music and serene visuals, make for the perfect relaxing experience!

Program artificial intelligences and let them fight against other programs in arenas of this dystopian vision of the future. This game focuses on the fun of coding and tweaking. There is always something to improve.

Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

In Costly Adventure, Match-3 gameplay meets the concept of roguelite runs. Party of adventurers is seeking a mighty artifact but they must meet the ever increasing payment demands from the bridge Troll.

Omega Warp is a sci-fi themed action-adventure, which takes place aboard an interstellar freighter. Explore, upgrade your skills and equipment, and uncover the mysteries surrounding the freighter's loss of communication with the base of operations on Earth.
How long can YOU run from God?!
A point&click puzzle game with a touch of Christmas.

The Infernal Masquerade is a gothic horror PS2 -inspired take on the classic minesweeper game, along with additional hints on the hidden undead, that make it more up to the player's skill to find the vampires behind the venetian masks.
Ecocoru is a puzzle game where you have to solve compass and ruler construction problems.

Explore a vast procedurally generated world where you never know what you'll see next. Explore and loot the world, finding your way through ancient structures such as the Catacombs. Slaughter enemies, grow your defenses, and escape the prison that is your mind. Just make sure you're not followed...

Stop the sailors from getting to their boat to fish the seas. Unite and use the creatures of the sea to prevent this from happening. Use physics to push and pull them off the dock before they can get there in this goofy physics based tower defense.
Make your way through the Simulation by jumping over lava, dodging dangerous spikes, and spending time with the helpful assistance program. All... as a meeple.
A chest full of diamonds awaits you on top of the Temple of Despair! Challenge yourself and climb the temple in this 2d-precision platformer!

Flint's Hints is an escape-room-like puzzle game where you investigate your surroundings to appease your fussy pet cat, Flint. Search for hints to figure out what he wants and how to give it to him, but be careful with what you investigate. Some things are meant to be left alone and forgotten...
Master the art of light and shadow in this unique 2D platformer, controlling both the hero and their shadow to conquer puzzles and foes. A visually stunning, mind-bending adventure awaits!

Gamebox is a free and open source sandbox game centered on user generated content. You decide what you want to play, be it in 3D or 2D, single-player or multiplayer, or create and upload your own games.

Cogstellation is a space mining game based entirely around connecting gears around. Improve your ship to be the space travel machine that you know it can be, colonize the solar system by defeating the existing colonies, and improve your base with the best mining and crafting equipment you can get.
Help your partner perform the heist of a lifetime! Send him instructions for how to get to each vault and make a getaway with your newly found fortune!
Don't let them touch your windshield!

ime: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom
opis: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom is a 2D action-platformer that combines elements of Shoot 'em up, Beat'em up, and Metroidvania to challenge players. Explore the parallel realm with Fadin and embark on exciting adventures while facing formidable enemies and uncovering hidden secrets.

Fight off your body's invaders using the combined strengths of your immune system's defenders! Immunity Wars is a turn-based tactics, classic hex grid, strategy game. Wield your units together effectively to fight off all kinds of bacteria, viruses, and even your own corrupted cells.
tranceWave NEO is a classic arcade twin-stick shmup, inspired by others in the "trance shooter" genre. Move, shoot, survive, and aim for a high score!

Beauty Riddle is a fun click puzzle game, each game level contains a number of word riddles, the answer to each riddle is hidden in the image of the beautiful girl, come and see how many riddles you can solve!

Fast-paced action rogue-Like survival with a touch of Soul-like, Challenging yet rewarding gameplay!, Battle with horde of monsters, Build your favorite hero with powerful skills and weapons in Action Rogue-like style, Fight your way to the epic boss and become a legend.

Are you a cowboy or a hipster? Choose your team and defend the city! Cowboys vs Hipsters is a real time strategy game. Spawn down your cowboys or your hipsters, send them into the city to stand and fight. May the worthy team win!

Embark on an adventure with Loot Express Delivery Service, a 2D pixel art game. As the commander, your goal is to retrieve valuable items from a distant planet. Utilize your skills and strategy to complete missions and guide your company to prosperity.

Face waves of enemies as you travel from room to room in your auto-shooting horde survival conquest. You and your companion must work together and create builds that compliment each other while exploring branching paths through various zones and worlds in a Roguelite setting.
Monsterlands is an exciting rogue-like survival game. Fight against the monsters and try to survive by upgrading your weapons and items.

Follow the story of Xandria, the iron alchemist. Seeking revenge, she accepts the dangerous mission to put an end to the evil that resides in Dracula's castle and torments the people of Transylvania. Fight with an iron whip in this retro-style & Classic-Vania adventure.
Hauma is a deduction visual novel set in Munich. Discover a conspiracy amongst the upper echelons of society alongside former detective Judith, while visiting real locations in a comic-inspired look.

Torecower is an innovative combination of tower defense and roguelike where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret has an unique attack behaviour. After finishing a wave, you can get a point for upgrades on the skill tree. Choose wisely to make your unique build.
Play the Prologue chapter of Vanaris Tactics. Lead a group of refugees looking for freedom outside the walls of Vanaris, and experience the first three battles and story of Vanaris Tactics.

ime: Duck in Town - A Rising Knight
opis: Duckson arrives at Town with one dream: to become the greatest Duck Knight ever. Play as a cute duck, explore the town, meet its quirky villagers and win the squawk contest in this comedy graphic adventure!

UFOTOFU:HEX is a zen match puzzler where you create palindrome chains on a hexagonal grid, giving you even more directions to trace your path than a traditional puzzle matching game. With charming sound and colourblind-friendly visuals, take your time creating the longest chains to maximise points.

Fall For You is a rhythm-based roguelike. Move and attack with the beat to power up, win the hearts of every damned soul you meet, traverse perilous obstacle courses, win fabulous prizes that change the way you play, and cuddle with a scary demon mom to keep yourself going!

The early stages of an RTS I created in a gap year. Create your loadout, send your mechs to battle, capture objectives and destroy the enemy base
Fight for the future in this story-heavy, boss-fights-only action game. Defeat, debug, and repair massive robots as you uncover the dark secrets of the Zodiac System.

An instant strategy science fiction simulation survival sandbox game. Players can control individuals, teams, and manage multiple bases. Players can farm, build, excavate, fight, produce, graze, explore, trade, record and pass on knowledge, and can also fly a spaceship to explore the starry sky.

Time Handlers is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game where you play as 2 employees of the Time Company tasked to repair the spatio-temporal rifts caused by a mysterious tower. Face baffling and exciting challenges to progress through the various levels of the rift that threatens time.

Archipelago - is a fun game about pirate adventures.
Rogue Rocks is a space rocks shoot-em-up with minimalist roguelite elements. Blast your way to the center of a procedurally generated galaxy before you get caught!

Three limbs ripped off, infected with a deadly parasite, you must save your research. Drag yourself through the corridors of a secret research lab on a remote asteroid, fight off horribly mutated monsters, inject countless syringes of vaccines, and survive at all costs.
Sweet love is a minimalist platformer with a committed message.
You accompanies the main protagonist in this action-packed 2D rogue lite on his quest.

Comic Company Manager is a comic book themed management game. Create your own comic publishing company and design your own ideas from combining 100+ concepts. Hire and manage artists to create comics for you and expand your company. Grow to dominate the industry

A top-down action game like no other. Use asteroids to block enemy bullets and smash enemy ships in this physics-based test of skill. Conquer 25 levels, vanquish 5 bosses, and maneuver through 5 tricky bonus waves.

Embark on a delightful adventure and seek out the Missing Critters hidden within intricate cartoon scenes, with a soothing lo-fi soundtrack and no time limits - just relax and unwind. Enjoy a captivating experience that will provide fresh challenges, as each play-through is unique.
Explore an open-ended nightmare using paranormal equipment to survive an onslaught of evil spirits that await your return.

opis: Anti-fascist gamers fight the Trump Zombie plague in this spree of rioting and looting!
