However, the notes and the exit are hidden, like Minesweeper, so be careful when listening to a note, because It may not be the right one to give sequence to the music
Arcane Fighters is 2D platform PvP where you can fight against your friends using magic, strategy and ... MAGIC! Choose from many unique spells and set up your build to outsmart opponents.

Defeat legions of pirates and marine beasts to emerge victorious in Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas! Adventure with survival elements. Customize your ship, prepare for barrages from myriad foes, and navigate the perilous waters of a monster realm. Embark on this thrilling journey and Play for Free now!

A bizarre hand-drawn (on paper with pencil :,) ) logic puzzle game. With Bouncing Odyssey, you'll experience 76 unique and challenging levels in three different worlds with four different physics based mechanics.

Embark on a journey through space and time, battling a cosmic menace to save the Universe. Using the all powerful Cossanox this alien seeks to reshape the known universe in order to spread and consume. You and your crew must put an end to the threat and recover the Cossanox.
Get down with the thiccness

Wire is in charge of maintaining a telecommunications center. Ready to take his well-deserved holidays, the entire network goes offline. Help Wire restart the repeater present in each sector. Be careful though! These sectors are a bit strange. Good luck!
Lair Hockey is all about taking the smooth precision of air hockey into an adventure through many arcade worlds and many unexpected unique challenges, in a quest beyond the table.

A realistic racing game with marbles. Design countless tracks and pilot a marble in fast races against 15 different teams, race your rivals to the championship podium in 10 pre-rendered tracks or just watch to an idle race in randomly created ones.
Roboggled is a sokoban style puzzle game where you play as a robot who needs to figure out how to deliver a crate to its drop point.
This is a casual card game based upon the theme of worldwide Travel and Tourism. Soon to be a FREE GAME!!
Guide your comrades to freedom in this gravity-bending sci-fi puzzle game. Modify their genetic code, direct their movements, and provide them with the tools they need to escape.
Miss being in the office? Want a career in recruitment? Obsessed with superhero's? Superhero Recruitment Simulator is your opportunity for you to work within the industry as a recruiter!
A unique turn based RPG with a Bank, a Card Shop, Blacksmith, as well as familiar spots like an Armor and Weapon Shop. Fight off 60 enemies and 3 bosses to beat the game!

In The Great Pickle Adventure, a pickle-based platformer, you can compete for the best level times, relax in an RPG world or try your skill in a game of breakout. Become a master of gravity and find your favorite among multiple unique weapons. Explore 20+ unique themed levels and special levels.

Run, jump, die, repeat. Help Teddy on his journey through the complex, 2D dungeon, where every step will try (and usually succeed) to kill him. Are you patient enough to finish one of the most difficult games of the year?

Karanos Solitaire is a relaxing combo-building card game designed for short solo gameplay sessions.

Your mind will short-circuit in this atmospheric pixel sci-fi puzzler with eight (8) levels of increasing difficulty. Decipher each binary sequence to travel further into the unknown, and unearth a deeper mystery that may never be fully understood.

The year is 1986 and you just got a job at the Helium Electric corporation.Your adventure begins on the Moon, where you manage a helium harvesting station.You are alone and your family is counting on you.
Ever had a rage playing a puzzle game? Would you like to have? Enter the fun world of Mr. Empathy and have fun with metaphors and puzzles in this 3D/2D game.

Your country has been captured and alongside other rebels you sabotage the enemy forces in order to aid your military in taking back your land.

An open world fantasy adventure in a voxel art style! Explore a massive, continuous overworld with puzzles, upgrades, a variety of weapon aspects and six dungeons. Play with keyboard or XBOX-style controller.

ime: Find And Kill The Evil King
opis: FIND AND KILL THE EVIL KING is a Roguelike designed to be simple, quick, and RNG-heavy. There's an evil king somewhere in this cursed dungeon. Can you find him? Can you kill him? And most importantly...what will you do once you do?
Explore a huge world. You can go in any direction. Get resources. Craft weapons and items. Create buildings. Use your imagination to the maximum.

Shoot lead & blow heads in Arena Brutal, an action shooter that'll put your weapons proficiency to the test! You'll need to manage the uniquely simulated recoil of each gun, keep on top of ammo & avoid getting your face blown off while speeding to the exit for the highest score & the next challenge
Turning cellular automata into an audiovisual experience. Automata Ecosystem is a GPU-powered cellular automata simulation with complex interactions and procedural audio generation.
DoodleDrive is a unique 2D driving game that challenges both your Creativity and Driving skills. First you Doodle, then you Drive on the path you have made to reach the finish line.
Retro, classic, couch-buddy competition in space! Simple controls make it easy for friends and family to join in the fun!

Walk through the various eras of platformers with humour thanks to Enionax. Go from black and white games to unmanageable patchless games! Go through all these eras again with humour.
A simple Golf Solitaire game with several common rule variations and a challenge mode! Can you beat all of the levels?

Nav charts are required for Colony Cephea, the first human colony outside of the Milky Way. Be our guiding light as humanity steps to the precipice of greatness. A short experimental, horror adventure.

Build your deck against hundreds of monsters and defend yourself against your enemies with the best deck. Unlock characters with rogue-lite elements, a wide range of weapons and special abilities as you progress.

Ever wanted to compete against your friend in a rhythm game? Well now you can! Rhythm Brawl is a versus rhythm game allows you have a rhythm battle to see who becomes "The King of Rhythm". Will you be the King? Play and Find out!

Physics-based arcade game that will leave you in stitches and begging for more. Unleash your 'special web fluid' to swing across the city, defeat neuter drones, and collect adult magazines.

In this last city of mankind, an isolated paradise in the ocean, your choices and dices will lead it to Utopia or Distopia. You will help the magistrate AI to investigate the AI-worship religious group, illicit drugs, those who were resurrected, and those who are neither android nor mankind…

ime: Squeebing Up the Tower of Friendship
opis: Can you make it to the top of the Tower of Friendship? Run, jump, climb, fall, and then do it all again. Play by yourself or with your friends. Be nice and lay down to make jumps easier for others, or push each other off when the falls are the highest. But whatever you do, never stop squeebing.

Run your gang of mobsters and conquer the city in this indie mafia tycoon game.

The second collection in the widely received "Forgotten Tapes" series, where we explore the theme of "Body Horror" with 8 unique games from different developers. Explore a morgue after hours & experiment on 8 poor souls who have lost their way. Can you make it through the night?
